title: The item to your left is your only weapon
body:
You have been drawn into battle with your favorite champs. The item that is currently to your left is your only weapon. What do you have to defend yourself with?

I have warmed over lasagna. I'm screwed unless Rengar is like Garfield and loves lasagna.

replies.body: Welp, milk carton. Let's hope this kitty likes milk. {{champion:76}}
Pass it off to me! My Gragas is deadly with a milk carton!
{{champion:76}} : "Did I mention it's mating season?"
Fiora vs me and an AK-47.......although if she was real in the situation i'd rather take her to dinner and a movie lol
Why do you have an AK-47 right next to your computer?
Lives in America.

It's illegal to own an AK-47 in America (and I'm pretty sure automatic weapons in general, but I could be wrong on that). The only places you see them are in real ghetto areas where gang violence is prevalent (such as Detroit).
its a semi auto variant hence legal to own but if you have a class 3 license you can own automatic weapons, my state however made them illegal unless owned before the law went into effect.
oh and i've owned it since before obama banned ak imports from russia....but since mines romanian it loopholes his ban lol
A Backpack. I think I could take {{champion:17}}  on.
Hopefully it is heavy with thick textbooks.
or bibles and holy water

I have a water bottle with no cap that's filled up about 1/3 of the way.

Imagine if I had a real weapon.{{champion:24}}
Meanwhile, I have an empty perrier (aka mineral water)...
Perrier is mineral water? Crap, I always thought it was a fancy type of beer.

Well, apparently *Perrier Noir* (or Mornen Noir) is a French wine grape, so ther eis a (maybe fancy) type of wine.

Otherwise, it's simple mineral water :P. You don't get much plainer than that.
http://www.thepolitesse.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/The-More-You-Know.png

A tall lamp.

{{champion:24}}

Oh uhh.... at least there are two of them?

{{item:2052}} {{item:2052}} {{item:2052}} {{item:2052}} {{item:2052}}
A pen. I am now Jason Bourne...
Hey, it's mightier than a sword.
{{champion:89}} Pen or sword, the shield is the mightiest!
Percy Jackson has a pen sword just saying..

MY NOTEBOOK FULL OF ARCHAIC SYMBOLS ^____________^ (learning Korean!)

I AM RYZE, GET REKT STAB TABBY
WTF im learning korean too :O its like we're the same person!

okay tomorrow this space will be filled with a message to you in korean you need to read without cheating and using google translate. (You will be able to read it if you're first year. I promise)

나는 한국어를 못하는 :(

I've only been learning for several months and picked up pace just about a month ago, you may underestimate my noobishness =p

I may use endic.naver for definitions but i won't cheat with google translate! Inasmuch as something so inaccurate can be called cheating anyway, lol.

Mirror = best counter to Draven i mean Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven 
He looks into it and never looks away from the beauty he sees
{{champion:119}}  Darius Plan me a wedding i think I'm in love 
{{champion:122}}  Kill me now please.

I have a pocket knife that is bigger than my hand....

Thank you tractor supply and bring it {{champion:412}}
wait wait wait......How is it a *pocket* knife then?

I have shorts that it fits in a pocket of

huehuehue
I just thought you had very small hands. http://i.ytimg.com/vi/C89uOeDL9Gw/hqdefault.jpg

My desktop computer.
{{champion:112}} is gonna murder me...  at Starcraft 2.  I can't out-micro a guy with three arms.

An inflatable Poro. :3 

*Here, kitty, kitty.*
{{champion:61}}  doesn't stand a chance against Duck, the Destroyer of Easter Eggs. He is the fiercest warrior >:3

I have lotion to my left
Syndra's my favorite champ
[](http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140726023420/clashofclans/images/5/50/If-you-know-what-i-mean.png)
The unseen stereo is the deadliest {{champion:238}}

I have to fight Cho'Gath, Gangplank, Garen, Hecarim, Nautilus, Nocturne, Thresh, Vel'Koz, Viktor, and Xerath.

All with my lamp.
Jax approves.

http://s29.postimg.org/p1ys3242v/IMG_20140807_132249.jpg

What do I do now?

I will protect you.

With my *biig foot*.

Oh, no. Sorry, not the monster, the candy.

Oh, hah.. Not even the candy, just a wrapper!

A headset...

I don't know, maybe I could make {{champion:115}} go deaf or something? He has big ears.

A spare office chair, hmmmmm.   

PREPARE TO BE......sat? Something tells me Renekton isn't going to be one for sitting, there's not even a hole for his tail!

-gulp-

Norton AntiVirus vs {{champion:51}} 

Hm.

A garbage can with a banana peel in it. 
Well maybe I can put it over {{champion:34}} 's head and run like hell.

Bills....

Can {{champion:4}}  throw bills?
I've got a really heavy keyboard and some sheet music. I think I'm doomed.
My sisters very expensive graphics tablet.... No matter what I do someone would end up trying to beat me senseless.

I Have a piano.

Draven's gonna see a whole new level of juggling.

I have 4 Central Processing units to my left...

Well... Yeah... {{champion:39}} LET THE CPU's FACE THE BLADES
